description:
BY TOOLKITMAN FOR APPLE II

INTRODUCTION
THIS IS A SMALL GAME BORN FROM A DEMO I HAVE BUILT IN 2020 FOR HALLOWEEN
WHERE THERE IS A LITTLE HORSE REMEMBERING SAINT MARTIN FESTIVITY.
SO I HAVE THOUGHT WHY NOT USE THAT HORSE TO BUILT A NEW BASIC 10 LINERS LITTLE
GAME FOR THE 2021 AND SO I AM HERE!

CODE EXPLAINED
THE CODE START WITH A SCREEN REFRESH AND A FOR NEXT TO ADD THE TITLE OF THE GAME.
THEN ASK AN INPUT TO SELECT THE HORSE AND START THE RACE.
THEN THERE IS THE GRAPHICAL PART WHERE THER IS SMALL HORSE GOING ON THE SCREEN AND THE 
LINE OF THE RACE.
AFTER THIS THERE IS THE IF STATMENT THAT MAKE A DIFFERENCE BETEWEEN THE GIVEN NUMBER AND THE 
ONE GIVEN BY THE RANDOM. THEN EVERYTHING START AGAIN WITH ANOTHER RANDOM NUMBER.

I HOPE YOU ALL ENJOY THIS LITTLE GAME FOR THE APPLE II EMULATORS AND COMPUTERS
